entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of snow changing to 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light early in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
